'''Minas Tsoulis''' (Greek: Μηνάς Τσούλης) is the author of two books related to the study of [[Quenya]]. He knows a number of languages, including English, French, Italian and Latin. His love for languages led him to the study of Quenya and the subsequent writing of a dictionary and a book of grammar. He is a member of the [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]] and he has also participated in other linguistic conferences.<ref>Minas Tsoulis, Quettaparma</ref>

==Bibliography==
* 2003: ''[[Quettaparma]]''
* 2003: ''[[Parma lambe Quenyanna]]''
